attributes.title: Mass Effect Rap - "We Are One"
attributes.caption: This rap encompasses both Mass Effect 1 & 2...easily the best two of the series. We aimed to match the emotion and stakes of those games and put them in this song.
attributes.description: This rap encompasses both Mass Effect 1 & 2...easily the best two of the series. We aimed to match the emotion and stakes of those games and put them in this song.

attributes.title: Dovahkiin Rap - "I'm Dovahkiin Bitch!"
attributes.caption: This was a song adapted from a goofy credit roll jingle. People asked for a full version of the song and then hated this when it came out. That was the last time we were easily influenced by the comment section.
attributes.description: This was a song adapted from a goofy credit roll jingle. People asked for a full version of the song and then hated this when it came out. That was the last time we were easily influenced by the comment section.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 3 Rap - "Born Into Revolution"
attributes.caption: A JTM classic that follows the exploits of Connor Kenway in Assassin's Creed 3.
attributes.description: A JTM classic that follows the exploits of Connor Kenway in Assassin's Creed 3.

attributes.title: Slender Rap
attributes.caption: This was the first scary game we decided to try. Looking back it's not that scary, but by this video you can tell how we really felt at the time.
attributes.description: This was the first scary game we decided to try. Looking back it's not that scary, but by this video you can tell how we really felt at the time.

attributes.title: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Rap
attributes.caption: Car games need more love and we deliver that with this Need for Speed: Most Wanted Rap.
attributes.description: Car games need more love and we deliver that with this Need for Speed: Most Wanted Rap.
attributes.display_title: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Rap

attributes.title: Hitman Absolution Rap
attributes.caption: Agent 47 drops some mean bars in this rap that follows the last full release for the Hitman franchise.
attributes.description: Agent 47 drops some mean bars in this rap that follows the last full release for the Hitman franchise.

attributes.title: Borderlands 2 Rap - "Grab Dat Loot!"
attributes.caption: A song that matches the chaos and charm of Borderlands 2. IT'S ALL ABOUT DAT LOOT!
attributes.description: A song that matches the chaos and charm of Borderlands 2. IT'S ALL ABOUT DAT LOOT!

attributes.title: Diablo III Rap
attributes.caption: Diablo III came out on my birthday. That's all I remember about this project.
attributes.description: Diablo III came out on my birthday. That's all I remember about this project.

attributes.title: Modern Warfare 3 Rap - "Runnin' Train"
attributes.caption: We had one MW3 song out at the time, but we wanted to do a new one in a more "Nerdcore" style and so here you have this!
attributes.description: We had one MW3 song out at the time, but we wanted to do a new one in a more "Nerdcore" style and so here you have this!
